oneOf.description: Broadly set functions and allowNamedExports to false.

classes.description: Whether to ignore references to class declarations.

enums.description: Whether to check references to enums.

functions.description: Whether to ignore references to function declarations.

ignoreTypeReferences.description: Whether to ignore type references, such as in type annotations and assertions.

typedefs.description: Whether to check references to types.

variables.description: Whether to ignore references to variables.
